hwDhcpv6Relay.name: hwDhcpv6Relay

revisions.description: V1.07, modified the format of InetAddress and InetAddressType in IMPORTS.
V1.06, added the leaf node hwDhcpv6RelayInterfaceSrcipv6 and hwDhcpv6RelayInterfaceSrcipv6LoopbackIfIndex.
V1.05, modified the systax and description of leaf node hwDhcpv6XponOntIndex, hwIpDhcpv6ServerAddrType1,hwIpDhcpv6ServerAddrType2, hwIpDhcpv6ServerAddrType3, and hwIpDhcpv6ServerAddrType4.
V1.04, modified the description of leaf node hwIpDhcpv6ServerAddrType1, hwIpDhcpv6ServerAddrType2, hwIpDhcpv6ServerAddrType3 and hwIpDhcpv6ServerAddrType4.
V1.03, modified the description of leaf node hwIfindexDhcpv6ServerInterface1, hwIfindexDhcpv6ServerInterface2, hwIfindexDhcpv6ServerInterface3 and hwIfindexDhcpv6ServerInterface4.
V1.02, added table node hwDhcpv6L2StatisticsTable, hwDhcpv6GroupTable, hwDhcpv6ToL3IfTable for supporting dhcpv6 l3 relay.

hwDhcpv6Relay.contactinfo: Huawei Industrial Base Bantian, Longgang Shenzhen 518129 People's Republic of China Website: http://www.huawei.com Email: support@huawei.com
hwDhcpv6Relay.description: The MIB is used for defining Huawei's DHCPv6 attribute. It includes DHCPv6 Relay Layer-2 and Layer-3.

hwDhcpv6L2StatisticsTable.name: hwDhcpv6L2StatisticsTable
hwDhcpv6L2StatisticsTable.description: Queries and resets the statistics of transmitted and received DHCPv6 L2 relay packets. The index of this table is ifIndex, and the value of the index must be 0.

hwDhcpv6L2StatisticsEntry.name: hwDhcpv6L2StatisticsEntry
hwDhcpv6L2StatisticsEntry.description: Queries and resets the statistics of transmitted and received DHCPv6 L2 relay packets. The index of this entry is ifIndex, and the value of the index must be 0.

hwDhcpv6L2ReceiveSolicit.name: hwDhcpv6L2ReceiveSolicit
hwDhcpv6L2ReceiveSolicit.description: Indicates the total number of received DHCPv6 solicit packets.

hwDhcpv6L2ReceiveAdvertise.name: hwDhcpv6L2ReceiveAdvertise
hwDhcpv6L2ReceiveAdvertise.description: Indicates the total number of received DHCPv6 advertise packets.

hwDhcpv6L2ReceiveRequest.name: hwDhcpv6L2ReceiveRequest

hwDhcpv6L2ReceiveUnknownType.name: hwDhcpv6L2ReceiveUnknownType
hwDhcpv6L2ReceiveUnknownType.description: Indicates the total number of received DHCPv6 unknown packets.

hwDhcpv6L2ReceiveInvalidUnicast.name: hwDhcpv6L2ReceiveInvalidUnicast
hwDhcpv6L2ReceiveInvalidUnicast.description: Indicates the total number of received unicast DHCPv6 Solicit, Information-request, Confirm and Rebind packets.

hwDhcpv6L2ReceiveOverlength.name: hwDhcpv6L2ReceiveOverlength
hwDhcpv6L2ReceiveOverlength.description: Indicates the total number of received DHCPv6 packets that exceed the maximum packet length.

hwDhcpv6L2ReceiveHopcountTooBig.name: hwDhcpv6L2ReceiveHopcountTooBig
hwDhcpv6L2ReceiveHopcountTooBig.description: Indicates the total number of received DHCPv6 packets that hop count not less than 32.

hwDhcpv6L2ReceiveUntrustRelayed.name: hwDhcpv6L2ReceiveUntrustRelayed
hwDhcpv6L2ReceiveUntrustRelayed.description: Indicates the total number of received DHCPv6 untrust relayed packets.

hwDhcpv6L2ReceiveDownstreamOnClientsideP.name: hwDhcpv6L2ReceiveDownstreamOnClientsidePort
hwDhcpv6L2ReceiveDownstreamOnClientsideP.description: Indicates the total number of received DHCPv6 downstream packets from user side port.

hwDhcpv6L2ReceiveRelayReplyWithoutOption.name: hwDhcpv6L2ReceiveRelayReplyWithoutOption9
hwDhcpv6L2ReceiveRelayReplyWithoutOption.description: Indicates the total number of received DHCPv6 relay-reply packets without option9.

hwDhcpv6L2ReceiveRelayReplyWithoutOption.name: hwDhcpv6L2ReceiveRelayReplyWithoutOption18
hwDhcpv6L2ReceiveRelayReplyWithoutOption.description: Indicates the total number of received DHCPv6 relay-reply packets without option18.

hwDhcpv6L2ReceiveRelayReplyWithInvalidPe.name: hwDhcpv6L2ReceiveRelayReplyWithInvalidPeerAddress
hwDhcpv6L2ReceiveRelayReplyWithInvalidPe.description: Indicates the total number of received DHCPv6 relay-reply packets whose peer-addresses are not equal to the destination addresses.

hwDhcpv6L2ReceiveRelayReplyLinkAddressNo.name: hwDhcpv6L2ReceiveRelayReplyLinkAddressNotZero
hwDhcpv6L2ReceiveRelayReplyLinkAddressNo.description: Indicates the total number of received DHCPv6 relay-reply packets whose link-addresses are not the unspecified addresses.

hwDhcpv6L2StatisticsClear.name: hwDhcpv6L2StatisticsClear
hwDhcpv6L2StatisticsClear.description: Resets the DHCPv6 packet statistics. Options: 1. clear(1) -resets the DHCPv6 packet statistics

hwDhcpv6L3SentLeasequeryData.description: Indicates the total number of sent DHCPv6 leasequery-data packets.

hwDhcpv6L3ReceiveUnknownType.name: hwDhcpv6L3ReceiveUnknownType
hwDhcpv6L3ReceiveUnknownType.description: Indicates the total number of received DHCPv6 unknown packets.

hwDhcpv6L3ReceiveInvalidUnicast.name: hwDhcpv6L3ReceiveInvalidUnicast
hwDhcpv6L3ReceiveInvalidUnicast.description: Indicates the total number of received unicast DHCPv6 Solicit, Information-request, Confirm and Rebind packets.

hwDhcpv6L3ReceiveInvalidSourceAddress.name: hwDhcpv6L3ReceiveInvalidSourceAddress
hwDhcpv6L3ReceiveInvalidSourceAddress.description: Indicates the total number of received DHCPv6 packets whose source address is LLA and is not filled with zero in its bits 16 to 31.

hwDhcpv6L3ReceiveOverlength.name: hwDhcpv6L3ReceiveOverlength
hwDhcpv6L3ReceiveOverlength.description: Indicates the total number of received DHCPv6 packets that exceed the maximum packet length.

hwDhcpv6L3ReceiveHopcountTooBig.name: hwDhcpv6L3ReceiveHopcountTooBig
hwDhcpv6L3ReceiveHopcountTooBig.description: Indicates the total number of received DHCPv6 packets that hop count not less than 32.

hwDhcpv6L3ReceiveUntrustRelayed.name: hwDhcpv6L3ReceiveUntrustRelayed
hwDhcpv6L3ReceiveUntrustRelayed.description: Indicates the total number of received DHCPv6 untrust relayed packets.

hwDhcpv6L3ReceiveDownstreamOnClientsideP.name: hwDhcpv6L3ReceiveDownstreamOnClientsidePort
hwDhcpv6L3ReceiveDownstreamOnClientsideP.description: Indicates the total number of received DHCPv6 downstream packets from user side port.

hwDhcpv6L3ReceiveRelayReplyWithoutOption.name: hwDhcpv6L3ReceiveRelayReplyWithoutOption9
hwDhcpv6L3ReceiveRelayReplyWithoutOption.description: Indicates the total number of received DHCPv6 relay-reply packets without option9.

hwDhcpv6L3StatisticsClear.name: hwDhcpv6L3StatisticsClear
hwDhcpv6L3StatisticsClear.description: Resets the DHCPv6 packet statistics. Options: 1. clear(1) -resets the DHCPv6 packet statistics

hwDhcpv6RelayConfigTable.name: hwDhcpv6RelayConfigTable
hwDhcpv6RelayConfigTable.description: Queries and sets the global config of DHCPv6 relay, including dhcpv6 relay mode, dhcpv6 option and dhcpv6 max-length. The index of this table is ifIndex, and the value of the index must be 0.

hwDhcpv6RelayConfigEntry.name: hwDhcpv6RelayConfigEntry
hwDhcpv6RelayConfigEntry.description: Queries and sets the global config of DHCPv6 relay, including dhcpv6 relay mode, dhcpv6 option and dhcpv6 max-length. The index of this entry is ifIndex, and the value of the index must be 0.

hwDhcpv6RelayMode.name: hwDhcpv6RelayMode
hwDhcpv6RelayMode.description: Queries and sets DHCPv6 forwarding mode of the system. Options: 1. layer2(1) -indicates dhcpv6 L2 mode 2. layer3(2) -indicates dhcpv6 L3 mode Default: layer2(1)

hwDhcpv6OptionStatus.name: hwDhcpv6OptionStatus
hwDhcpv6OptionStatus.description: Queries and sets DHCPv6 option switch status. Options: 1. enable(1) -indicates that DHCPv6 option function is enbled 2. disable(2) -indicates that DHCPv6 option function is disabled Default: disable(2)

hwDhcpv6MaxLenAppendOption.name: hwDhcpv6MaxLenAppendOption
hwDhcpv6MaxLenAppendOption.description: Indicates the allowable maximum length of a DHCPv6 packet. Range: 500-1500 Unit: byte Default: 1500 bytes

hwDhcpv6RelayInterfaceSrcipv6.name: hwDhcpv6RelayInterfaceSrcipv6
hwDhcpv6RelayInterfaceSrcipv6.description: The mode for the Layer 3 DHCPv6 relay to fill in the source IPv6 address of the packet.When hwDhcpv6RelayInterfaceSrcipv6 is in loopback mode, hwDhcpv6RelayInterfaceSrcipv6LoopbackIfIndex must be issued together. Data type: integer Options: 1. receive(1) -Means to fill in the IPv6 address of the receive interface as the source IPv6 address of the Relay-Forward packet 2. send(2) -Means to fill in the IPv6 address of the send interface as the source IPv6 address of the Relay-Forward packet 3. loopback(3) -Means to fill in the IPv6 address of the loopback interface as the source IPv6 address of the Relay-Forward packet Default: send(2)

hwDhcpv6RelayInterfaceSrcipv6LoopbackIfI.name: hwDhcpv6RelayInterfaceSrcipv6LoopbackIfIndex
hwDhcpv6RelayInterfaceSrcipv6LoopbackIfI.description: It is the loopback interface ID when the mode for the Layer 3 DHCPv6 relay to fill in the source IPv6 address of the packet is loopback, and is the invalid value -1 when the mode is not loopback. Range: -1-31 Default: -1

hwDhcpv6OptionForwardTable.name: hwDhcpv6OptionForwardTable
hwDhcpv6OptionForwardTable.description: Queries and sets DHCPv6 option permit-forwarding switch. The indexes of this table are ifIndex and hwDhcpv6XponOntIndex.

hwDhcpv6OptionForwardEntry.name: hwDhcpv6OptionForwardEntry
hwDhcpv6OptionForwardEntry.description: Queries and sets DHCPv6 option permit-forwarding switch. The indexes of this entry are ifIndex and hwDhcpv6XponOntIndex.

hwDhcpv6XponOntIndex.name: hwDhcpv6XponOntIndex
hwDhcpv6XponOntIndex.description: ONT index The ONT index should be set to 2147483647 when the ifIndex indicates that the port type is not xPON.

hwDhcpv6OptionForward.name: hwDhcpv6OptionForward
hwDhcpv6OptionForward.description: Queries and sets DHCPv6 option permit-forwarding switch status. Options: 1. enable(1) -indicates that DHCPv6 option permit-forwarding function is enbled 2. disable(2) -indicates that DHCPv6 option permit-forwarding function is disabled Default: enable(1)

hwDhcpv6GroupTable.name: hwDhcpv6GroupTable
hwDhcpv6GroupTable.description: Describes the DHCPv6 server group, including IPv6 addresses of each DHCPv6 server and interfaces that connects to each DHCPv6 server in each group. It supports the create, modify, delete, and query operations. The index of this table is hwDhcpv6GroupID.

hwDhcpv6GroupEntry.name: hwDhcpv6GroupEntry
hwDhcpv6GroupEntry.description: Describes the DHCPv6 server group, including IPv6 addresses of each DHCPv6 server and interfaces that connects to each DHCPv6 server in each group. It supports the create, modify, delete, and query operations. The index of this entry is hwDhcpv6GroupID.

hwDhcpv6GroupID.name: hwDhcpv6GroupID
hwDhcpv6GroupID.description: Indicates the index of the DHCPv6 server group. Range: 0C19

hwIpDhcpv6ServerAddrType1.name: hwIpDhcpv6ServerAddrType1
hwIpDhcpv6ServerAddrType1.description: Indicates the IPv6 address type of the first server in the DHCPv6 server group. Options: 1. unknown(0) -indicates that DHCPv6 server address is not configurated. It is only used in the query operation. 2. ipv6(2) -indicates that DHCPv6 server address type is ipv6.

hwIpDhcpv6ServerAddr1.name: hwIpDhcpv6ServerAddr1
hwIpDhcpv6ServerAddr1.description: Indicates the IPv6 address of the first server in the DHCPv6 server group. It must be a valid unicast IPv6 address and the interface must be configured when the IPv6 address is LLA.

hwIfindexDhcpv6ServerInterface1.name: hwIfindexDhcpv6ServerInterface1
hwIfindexDhcpv6ServerInterface1.description: Indicates the interface that connects to the first server in the DHCPv6 server group. The value of this leaf is VLAN ID. It must be configured when the IPv6 address is LLA and cannot be configured when the IPv6 address is GUA. If the interface that connects to the first server is not configured, the value of this leaf is -1. Range: -1, 1C4093

hwIpDhcpv6ServerAddrType2.name: hwIpDhcpv6ServerAddrType2
hwIpDhcpv6ServerAddrType2.description: Indicates the IPv6 address type of the second server in the DHCPv6 server group. Options: 1. unknown(0) -indicates that DHCPv6 server address is not configurated. It is only used in the query operation. 2. ipv6(2) -indicates that DHCPv6 server address type is ipv6.

hwIpDhcpv6ServerAddr2.name: hwIpDhcpv6ServerAddr2
hwIpDhcpv6ServerAddr2.description: Indicates the IPv6 address of the second server in the DHCPv6 server group. It must be a valid unicast IPv6 address and the interface must be configured when the IPv6 address is LLA.

hwIfindexDhcpv6ServerInterface2.name: hwIfindexDhcpv6ServerInterface2
hwIfindexDhcpv6ServerInterface2.description: Indicates the interface that connects to the second server in the DHCPv6 server group. The value of this leaf is VLAN ID. It must be configured when the IPv6 address is LLA and cannot be configured when the IPv6 address is GUA. If the interface that connects to the second server is not configured, the value of this leaf is -1. Range: -1, 1C4093

hwIpDhcpv6ServerAddrType3.name: hwIpDhcpv6ServerAddrType3
hwIpDhcpv6ServerAddrType3.description: Indicates the IPv6 address type of the third server in the DHCPv6 server group. Options: 1. unknown(0) -indicates that DHCPv6 server address is not configurated. It is only used in the query operation. 2. ipv6(2) -indicates that DHCPv6 server address type is ipv6.

hwIpDhcpv6ServerAddr3.name: hwIpDhcpv6ServerAddr3
hwIpDhcpv6ServerAddr3.description: Indicates the IPv6 address of the third server in the DHCPv6 server group. It must be a valid unicast IPv6 address and the interface must be configured when the IPv6 address is LLA.

hwIfindexDhcpv6ServerInterface3.name: hwIfindexDhcpv6ServerInterface3
hwIfindexDhcpv6ServerInterface3.description: Indicates the interface that connects to the third server in the DHCPv6 server group. The value of this leaf is VLAN ID. It must be configured when the IPv6 address is LLA and cannot be configured when the IPv6 address is GUA. If the interface that connects to the third server is not configured, the value of this leaf is -1. Range: -1, 1C4093

hwIpDhcpv6ServerAddrType4.name: hwIpDhcpv6ServerAddrType4
hwIpDhcpv6ServerAddrType4.description: Indicates the IPv6 address type of the fourth server in the DHCPv6 server group. Options: 1. unknown(0) -indicates that DHCPv6 server address is not configurated. It is only used in the query operation. 2. ipv6(2) -indicates that DHCPv6 server address type is ipv6.

hwIpDhcpv6ServerAddr4.name: hwIpDhcpv6ServerAddr4
hwIpDhcpv6ServerAddr4.description: Indicates the IPv6 address of the fourth server in the DHCPv6 server group. It must be a valid unicast IPv6 address and the interface must be configured when the IPv6 address is LLA.

hwIfindexDhcpv6ServerInterface4.name: hwIfindexDhcpv6ServerInterface4
hwIfindexDhcpv6ServerInterface4.description: Indicates the interface that connects to the fourth server in the DHCPv6 server group. The value of this leaf is VLAN ID. It must be configured when the IPv6 address is LLA and cannot be configured when the IPv6 address is GUA. If the interface that connects to the fourth server is not configured, the value of this leaf is -1. Range: -1, 1C4093

hwDhcpv6RowStatus.name: hwDhcpv6RowStatus
hwDhcpv6RowStatus.description: Row status, used for configuring the DHCPv6 server group. Options: 1. active(1) -when this leaf is queried, the value is fixed to active(1). 2. createAndGo(4) -create a DHCPv6 server group 3. destroy(6) -delete a DHCPv6 server group To create a DHCPv6 server group, specify the index, hwIpDhcpv6ServerAddrType1 and leaf hwIpDhcpv6ServerAddr1(other leaves are optional), set hwDhcpv6RowStatus to createAndGo, and perform the set operation. To modify a DHCPv6 server group, specify the index, hwIpDhcpv6ServerAddrType1 and leaf hwIpDhcpv6ServerAddr1(other leaves are optional), and perform the set operation. To delete a DHCPv6 server group, specify index hwDhcpv6GroupID, set hwDhcpv6RowStatus to destroy(6), and perform the set operation. In the query operation, the value of this leaf is always active(1).

hwDhcpv6ToL3IfTable.name: hwDhcpv6ToL3IfTable
hwDhcpv6ToL3IfTable.description: Describes the binding between the VLAN interface and the DHCPv6 server group. It supports the create, query, and modify operations. The index of this table is hwDhcpv6ToL3VlanIfIndex.

hwDhcpv6ToL3IfEntry.name: hwDhcpv6ToL3IfEntry
hwDhcpv6ToL3IfEntry.description: Describes the binding between the VLAN interface and the DHCPv6 server group. It supports the create, query, and modify operations. The index of this entry is hwDhcpv6ToL3VlanIfIndex.

hwDhcpv6ToL3VlanIfIndex.name: hwDhcpv6ToL3VlanIfIndex
hwDhcpv6ToL3VlanIfIndex.description: Indicates the VLAN bound to the DHCPv6 server group. It uses hwVlanInterfaceID of hwVlanInterfaceTable. Range: 1C4093

hwDhcpv6ToL3GroupId.name: hwDhcpv6ToL3GroupId
hwDhcpv6ToL3GroupId.description: Indicates the corresponding DHCPv6 server group of the VLAN interface. Range: 0-19 In the configuration, if the value of hwDhcpv6ToL3GroupId is in the range of 0C19, ensure that the server group corresponding to this ID exists.

hwDhcpv6ToL3RowStatus.name: hwDhcpv6ToL3RowStatus
hwDhcpv6ToL3RowStatus.description: Indicates the row status, used to configure the corresponding DHCPv6 server group of the VLAN interface. Options: 1. active(1) -when this leaf is queried, the value is fixed to active(1). 2. createAndGo(4) -create a binding between the VLAN interface and the DHCPv6 server group 3. destroy(6) -delete a binding between the VLAN interface and the DHCPv6 server group Creates the binding between the VLAN interface and the DHCPv6 server group. Specify the hwDhcpv6ToL3VlanIfIndex and hwDhcpv6ToL3GroupId, set hwDhcpv6ToL3RowStatus to createAndGo(4), and perform the set operation. In the query operation, the value of this leaf is always active(1). Modifies the binding between the VLAN interface and the DHCPv6 server group. Specify the hwDhcpv6ToL3VlanIfIndex and hwDhcpv6ToL3GroupId, and perform the set operation. Deletes the binding between the VLAN interface and the DHCPv6 server group, Specify the hwDhcpv6ToL3VlanIfIndex, set hwDhcpv6ToL3RowStatus to destroy(6), and perform the set operation.
